text:
Market News April 13, 2018 / 10:31 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Dr Pepper Snapple Says The Grupo Peñafiel & Canada Dry Mott’S Entity Names To Remain Unchanged From Keurig Deal Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc: 
* CURRENT PLANS ARE THAT THE GRUPO PEÑAFIEL & CANADA DRY MOTT’S ENTITY NAMES TO REMAIN UNCHANGED FROM KEURIG DEAL - SEC FILING Source text:( bit.ly/2HlRAAG ) Further company coverage:
